pullRequest.title: Drop some FKs, trigger and ununsed indexes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Apekshit Sharma apekshit.sharma@hedera.com
Detailed description:
Changes to optimize write performance

Drop foreign keys in t_transactions
Drop foreign keys referencing t_transactions(consensus_timestamp) in t_cryptotransferlists, t_file_data,
t_livehashes and t_contract_result.
Drop trigger in topic_message
Drop unused indexes: idx_t_transactions_rec_file, idx__t_cryptotransferlist_amount

Removing trigger results in failure of NotifyingTopicListenerTest. So the change cascades to deletion of notify listener related code.
Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Partly addresses #512
Special notes for your reviewer:
Not renaming the columns fk_payer_acc_id, fk_node_acc_id, fk_cud_entity_id and fk_rec_file_id to keep this change simple and sweet. If needed, those can be done as part of upcoming changes to how we write/update entities from importer.
Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated
